message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. I'm willing to pay that amount for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I understand that you're looking for a better deal. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $82.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $75. I'm willing to pay that amount for the product.
I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $79.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to pay $76 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $78.
I understand that you're getting close to your minimum price, Alice. However, I'm still looking for a good deal. I'm willing to pay $77 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm at my minimum price. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $78. This is my final offer.
I understand that you're at your minimum price, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable paying $78. I'm willing to pay $77.50 for the product.
